content.query:
-- =============================================================================
-- OpenHack MDWH
-- Azure Synapse Analytics Demo
-- https://github.com/aessing/demo-azuresynapse
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Developer.......: Andre Essing (https://www.andre-essing.de/)
--                                (https://github.com/aessing)
--                                (https://twitter.com/aessing)
--                                (https://www.linkedin.com/in/aessing/)
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- THIS CODE AND INFORMATION ARE PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND,
-- EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE IMPLIED
-- WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND/OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
-- =============================================================================

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'movies_demosynapsedls01') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [movies_demosynapsedls01] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://movies@demosynapsedls01.dfs.core.windows.net/',
		TYPE = HADOOP 
	)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.schemas WHERE name = 'ext') 
	EXEC('CREATE SCHEMA [ext]')
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [ext].[Sales] (
	[SourceSystemID] int,
	[GlobalOrderID] nvarchar(4000),
	[SourceSystemOrderID] nvarchar(4000),
	[CustomerID] nvarchar(4000),
	[OrderDate] date,
	[ShipDate] date,
	[TotalCost] numeric(19,4),
	[OrderCreatedDate] date,
	[OrderUpdatedDate] date,
	[OrderDetailID] nvarchar(4000),
	[MovieID] nvarchar(4000),
	[Quantity] int,
	[UnitCost] numeric(19,4),
	[LineNumber] int,
	[OrderDetailCreatedDate] date,
	[OrderDetailUpdatedDate] date
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'curated/sales.parquet/',
	DATA_SOURCE = [movies_demosynapsedls01],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat],
	REJECT_TYPE = VALUE,
	REJECT_VALUE = 0
	)
GO
